general.name: mos_target_sdss_dr16_specobj
general.description: This is a base table containing ALL the spectroscopic information, including a lot of duplicate and bad data. Use the SpecObj view instead, which has the data properly filtered for cleanliness. These tables contain both the BOSS and SDSS spectrograph data. NOTE: The RA and Dec in this table refer to the DR8 coordinates, which have errors in the region north of 41 deg in Dec. This change does not affect the matching to the photometric catalog.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_sdss_dr16_specobj-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

specobjid.name: SPECOBJID
specobjid.description: Unique database ID based on PLATE, MJD, FIBERID, RUN2D

scienceprimary.name: SCIENCEPRIMARY
scienceprimary.description: Best version of spectrum at this location (defines default view SpecObj)

sdssprimary.name: SDSSPRIMARY
sdssprimary.description: Best version of spectrum at this location among SDSS plates (defines default view SpecObj)

legacyprimary.name: LEGACYPRIMARY
legacyprimary.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among Legacy plates

segueprimary.name: SEGUEPRIMARY
segueprimary.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among SEGUE plates

segue1primary.name: SEGUE1PRIMARY
segue1primary.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among SEGUE-1 plates

segue2primary.name: SEGUE2PRIMARY
segue2primary.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among SEGUE-2 plates

bossprimary.name: BOSSPRIMARY
bossprimary.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among BOSS plates

bossspecobjid.name: BOSSSPECOBJID
bossspecobjid.description: Index of BOSS observation in spAll flat file

firstrelease.name: FIRSTRELEASE
firstrelease.description: Name of first release this object was associated with

legacy_target1.name: LEGACY_TARGET1
legacy_target1.description: for Legacy program, target selection information at plate design

legacy_target2.name: LEGACY_TARGET2
legacy_target2.description: for Legacy program target selection information at plate design, secondary/qa/calibration

special_target1.description: for Special program target selection information at plate design

segue1_target1.description: SEGUE-1 target selection information at plate design, primary science selection

segue2_target2.name: SEGUE2_TARGET2
segue2_target2.description: SEGUE-2 target selection information at plate design, secondary/qa/calib selection

boss_target1.name: BOSS_TARGET1
boss_target1.description: BOSS target selection information at plate

eboss_target0.name: EBOSS_TARGET0
eboss_target0.description: EBOSS target selection information, for SEQUELS plates

eboss_target1.name: EBOSS_TARGET1
eboss_target1.description: EBOSS target selection information, for eBOSS plates

eboss_target2.name: EBOSS_TARGET2
eboss_target2.description: EBOSS target selection information, for TDSS, SPIDERS, ELG, etc. plates

eboss_target_id.name: EBOSS_TARGET_ID
eboss_target_id.description: EBOSS unique target identifier for every spectroscopic target,

ancillary_target1.name: ANCILLARY_TARGET1
ancillary_target1.description: BOSS ancillary science target selection information at plate design

ancillary_target2.name: ANCILLARY_TARGET2
ancillary_target2.description: BOSS ancillary target selection information at plate design

thing_id_targeting.name: THING_ID_TARGETING
thing_id_targeting.description: thing_id value from the version of resolve from which the targeting was created

primtarget.name: PRIMTARGET
primtarget.description: target selection information at plate design, primary science selection (for backwards compatibility)

sectarget.name: SECTARGET
sectarget.description: target selection information at plate design, secondary/qa/calib selection (for backwards compatibility)

sourcetype.name: SOURCETYPE
sourcetype.description: For Legacy, SEGUE-2 and BOSS science targets, type of object targeted as (target bits contain full information and are recommended)

targettype.name: TARGETTYPE
targettype.description: Nature of target: SCIENCE, STANDARD, or SKY

ra.name: RA
ra.description: DR8 Right ascension of fiber, J2000

cx.name: CX
cx.description: x of Normal unit vector in J2000

cy.name: CY
cy.description: y of Normal unit vector in J2000

cz.name: CZ
cz.description: z of Normal unit vector in J2000

lambdaeff.name: LAMBDAEFF
lambdaeff.description: Effective wavelength that hole was drilled for (accounting for atmopheric refraction)

bluefiber.name: BLUEFIBER
bluefiber.description: Set to 1 if this hole was designated a "blue fiber", 0 if designated a "red fiber" (high redshift LRGs are preferentially in "red fibers")

zoffset.name: ZOFFSET
zoffset.description: Washer thickness used (for backstopping BOSS quasar targets, so they are closer to 4000 Angstrom focal plan)

zwarning.name: ZWARNING
zwarning.description: Bitmask of warning values; 0 means all is well

dof.name: DOF
dof.description: Degrees of freedom in best fit

rchi2diff.name: RCHI2DIFF
rchi2diff.description: Difference in reduced chi-squared between best and second best fit

z_noqso.name: Z_NOQSO
z_noqso.description: Best redshift when excluding QSO fit in BOSS spectra (right redshift to use for galaxy targets)

rchi2diff_noqso.name: RCHI2DIFF_NOQSO
rchi2diff_noqso.description: Reduced chi-squared difference from next best redshift, for "z_noqso" redshift

z_person.name: Z_PERSON
z_person.description: Person-assigned redshift, if this object has been inspected

class_person.name: CLASS_PERSON
class_person.description: Person-assigned classification, if this object has been inspected

comments_person.name: COMMENTS_PERSON
comments_person.description: Comments from person for inspected objects
